article:
Formatting specifications for UBL Despatch Advice instances
2004OASIS $Date: 2005-05-27 22:23:19 $(UTC)
Despatch advice formatting specifications
Three sample formatting specifications are offered for this document type:
Office-oriented despatch advice form
Joinery-oriented despatch advice form
United Nations Layout Key form 351: Despatch Advice
For a list of all formatting specifications and an overview of the documentation conventions, please visit the formatting specification home page.
&FS-status;
